settings.event_post_help: Create an event post in the discussion where a "duplicate" flag has been raised. This can inform users that the discussion is potentially a duplicate of another, without giving them access to the overall flags which have been raised.

flags.reason_duplicate_text: This discussion is a duplicate of another.

post_stream.flagged_duplicate_text: {username} marked this discussion as a potential duplicate of {duplicate}. A moderator will investigate shortly.
